definitions: An arrangement or design regularly found in comparable objects.
A regular and intelligible form or sequence discernible in the way in which something happens or is done.
A model or design used as a guide in needlework and other crafts.
A set of instructions to be followed in making a sewn or knitted item.
A wooden or metal model from which a mould is made for a casting.
A sample of cloth or wallpaper.
An example for others to follow.
